pageArray.pageText: This is the first page of a multi-page tutorial.
In these tutorials, you can include arbitrary text and titles.  The background and button colors are also programmable
The images on each page can be screenshots from your app so that you can explain different views.
And not conform to the size of an app screenshot.  But in this case, they will still have the same space restrictions
The resources backing this tutorial are JSON and images.  You can set these up with relative ease.
